summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 44109, creating Local Improvement District No. 3570, entitled: "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East Harrison Street, from 33rd Avenue North to 32nd Avenue North, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6975 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds", approved the 16th day of September, 1922.
